== Testing new versions of lxc-android-config ==

=== Download the lxc-android-config package ===

=== Install the package ===

{{{#!highlight bash
ubuntu-device-flash touch --channel=ubuntu-touch/rc-proposed/ubuntu --bootstrap --recovery-image /path/to/adb-enabled-recovery.img

adb reboot bootloader
fastboot flash recovery /path/to/adb-enabled-recovery.img

adb reboot recovery

adb shell mount /system
adb shell mount /data
adb shell mount /data/system.img /system

adb push lxc-android-config_*.deb /system/tmp

adb shell chroot /system /usr/bin/env PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin sh -c 'dpkg -i /tmp/*.deb'

adb shell umount /system
adb shell sync
adb reboot
}}}
